lines: THERE IS SUNLIGHT IN THE HEART
1. Akasuba pa lupili. Pamo na pa cimana;
Lelo lubuto lwa cine. Lwaisulo mutima;
Pantu umwikala Yesu, Mulabuta fye lyonse.
Cimwemwe ica kwa Yesu, Lubuto ku mutima.
2. Naposa bulanda bwandi. Nge nsalu yabipisha,
Na mu mushi wa lulumbi, Untu anteyanisha,
3. Mfumu yandi, walinshita, Na fyonse fyandi fyobe;
Lubuto ulwa kutemwa, Lubuto pali ine.
Namu mushi wa lulumbi, Untu anteyanisha;
